column2: I am delighted to come to Michigan
column4: because unless we have those resources in this school
column5: unless you comprehend the nature of what is being asked of you
column6: this country can't possibly move through the next 10 years in a period of relative strength.So I come here tonight to go to bed! But I also come here tonight to ask you to join in the effort...This university... this is the longest short speech I've ever made... therefore
column7: I'll finish it! Let me say in conclusion
column8: this University is not maintained by its alumni
column10: merely to help its graduates have an economic advantage in the life struggle. There is certainly a greater purpose
column11: and I'm sure you recognize it. Therefore
column12: I do not apologize for asking for your support in this campaign. I come here tonight asking your support for this country over the next decade.
